objects.text:
• Energy-efficient ventless technology
• Multiple fabric care settings
• Advanced moisture sensors
• Perfect for compact spaces

product_details.name: Insignia High-Efficiency Compact Ventless Dryer - Modern Laundry Solution
product_details.description:
• ✨ Sleek white design with modern digital display and intuitive controls
• 🌟 Multiple drying cycles including Normal, Heavy Duty, Delicates, and Quick Dry
• ⚡ Energy-efficient ventless condensing technology
• 🎯 Precise electronic controls with LED time display
• 🔄 Large capacity drum with convenient front-loading design
• 💨 Advanced moisture sensor for optimal drying results
• 🏠 Perfect for apartments, condos, and spaces without external venting
• ⚙️ Easy-to-use control dial with multiple fabric care settings
• 🛠️ Built-in maintenance reminder system
• 📏 Space-saving compact design without compromising performance

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a sleek and modern design tailored for a home appliance product. The background is composed of dynamic geometric overlays with various opacities and shapes, introducing a sense of movement and depth. A prominent white headline (`heading`) introduces the product, followed by a subheadline (`subheading`) in a cream tone. A concise bulleted list (`description`) outlines its key features, while a soft tagline (`tagline`) subtly supports the message. The call to action is clear, with a bold white price tag (`price`) and a contrasting cream-colored button (`cta_button`) with navy-blue CTA text (`cta`). A realistic product image (`product_image`) is anchored to the right.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Blue: `#0D1B2A`
- Steel Blue: `#1B263B`
- Slate Blue: `#415A77`
- Misty Blue: `#778DA9`
- Off-White: `#E0E1DD`
- Pure White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image presents a sleek, modern dryer with a minimalist design dominated by a crisp white base (#FFFFFF), giving it a clean and sophisticated look. The door and control panel feature a deep black (#1A1A1A), creating bold contrast and highlighting functional areas. Accents such as the digital display use a cool blue (#00BFFF) and white text for visibility, while the settings dial incorporates subtle red (#E74C3C) and blue (#2980B9) hues for temperature indicators, enhancing usability. These colors are well-blended yet distinct, making each function intuitive. For the banner, a clean monochrome palette accented with these colors will maintain a premium feel.
